data.name: ACTIVE_BELL
data.comment: This is the tooltip text displayed for the Bell icon when the automatic bell is active

data.name: ADAPTIVE_MODE_NONE
data.comment: One of the drop-down options in Settings, Automatic Mode

data.name: ADAPTIVE_MODE_ONE_WAY
data.comment: One of the drop-down options in Settings, Automatic Mode

data.name: ADAPTIVE_MODE_TWO_WAY
data.comment: One of the drop-down options in Settings, Automatic Mode

data.name: APP_VER
data.comment: See Settings, Main. Please keep the curly braces and thier contents - these are placeholders for text that is inserted at run-time.

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_12
data.comment: The 12-hour clock format

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_12Z
data.comment: The 12-hour clock format with a leading zero where appropriate

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_24
data.comment: The 24-hour clock format

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_24Z
data.comment: The 24-hour clock format with leading zero where appropriate

data.name: CREATE_FOLDER_ERROR
data.comment: Please keep the curly braces and thier contents - these are placeholders for text that is inserted at run-time.

data.name: DURATION_ADAPTED
data.comment: Tooltip describing the time that is shown bottom left of the black panel in the main page.

data.name: DURATION_MODIFIED
data.comment: Tooltip describing the time that is shown bottom left of the black panel in the main page.

data.name: DURATION_ORIGINAL
data.comment: Tooltip describing the time that is shown bottom left of the black panel in the main page.

data.name: FULL_SCREEN_ANALOGUE
data.comment: i.e. an analogue clock (with face and hands)

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_12AMPM
data.comment: The 12-hour clock format with "am" or "pm" appended. If your language doesn't use "am" and "pm" you can leave this item untranslated

data.name: CLOCK_FORMAT_12ZAMPM
data.comment: The 12-hour clock format with a leading zero and "am" or "pm" appended. If your language doesn't use "am" and "pm" you can leave this item untranslated

data.name: NOT_AVAIL_TIMER_RUNNING
data.value: Nid yw'r gosodiadau ar gael tra bod yr amserydd yn rhedeg!

data.name: NOT_AVAIL_ADMIN
data.comment: This text is used as the Settings button tooltip when the Settings page has been disabled by the administrator.

data.name: CLOSE_COUNTDOWN
data.comment: Title of the CLOSE COUNTDOWN button on the main page. Please keep the capitals. "Countdown" refers to the function that displays a countdown timer before the start of the meeting

data.name: MAIN_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, MAIN section. Please keep capitals

data.name: ACCESS_CODE
data.comment: See Settings, Remote Apps. Similar to a PIN or a password

data.name: ADAPTIVE_MIDWEEK
data.comment: See Settings, Automatic Mode

data.name: ADAPTIVE_WEEKEND
data.comment: See Settings, Automatic Mode

data.name: ALLOW_COUNT_UP_TOGGLE
data.comment: See Settings, Miscellaneous

data.name: ALWAYS_ON_TOP
data.comment: See Settings, Miscellaneous

data.name: APPS_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, REMOTE APPS section. Please keep capitals

data.name: AUTO_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, AUTOMATIC MODE section. Please keep capitals

data.name: BELL_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, BELL section. Please keep capitals

data.name: CLOCK_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, WEB CLOCK section. Please keep capitals

data.name: COUNTDOWN_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, MEETING COUNTDOWN section. Please keep capitals. CLOSE_COUNTDOWN CLOSE COUNTDOWN Title of the CLOSE COUNTDOWN button on the main page. "Countdown" refers to the function that displays a countdown timer before the start of the meeting

data.name: ENABLED
data.comment: This item is no longer used. Please see "ENABLED_XYZ"

data.name: IP_ADDRESS
data.comment: Network address

data.name: MEETING
data.comment: Type of meeting (i.e. weeked or mid-week)

data.name: MISC_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, MISCELLANEOUS section. Please keep capitals

data.name: MTG_START_NOTES1
data.value: Rhowch bob amser cychwyn ar linell newydd.

data.name: MTG_START_NOTES2
data.value: Defnyddiwch unrhyw fformat amser y dymunwch!

data.name: OPEN_PORT
data.comment: Caption for the "open port" button in settings. Please keep the capitals

data.name: OP_MODE
data.comment: The operating mode (i.e. manual, auto or file-based)

data.name: PERSIST_STUDENT_TIME
data.comment: All the monitor to display the final student time for a little longer than normal

data.name: PERSIST_TALK_DURATION
data.comment: How long the talk timer is shown after the end of the item

data.name: PORT
data.comment: i.e. the TCP (networking) "port"

data.name: REMOTE_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, REMOTE ACCESS section. Please keep capitals

data.name: SECTOR_ANALOG_CLOCK
data.value: Dangos y sector ar gloc analog
data.comment: The "sector" is the light green quadrant that appears on the analogue clock face to denote a talk duration

data.name: TEST
data.comment: Caption for the Bell test button in settings. Please keep the capitals

data.name: THROTTLED
data.comment: Communication is deliberately limited to prevent overloading

data.name: TIMER_COUNT_UP
data.comment: Counts up rather than down

data.name: TIMER_WIN_SECTION
data.comment: Title for Settings, TIMER WINDOW section. Please keep capitals

data.name: TIME_UNDER_TIMER
data.value: Amser o'r dydd o dan amserydd
data.comment: Show time of day underneath the timer

data.name: VOLUME
data.comment: Label for the volume control in the Bell settings

data.name: RESTART_LANGUAGE
data.value: Ailgychwynnwch OnlyT ar ôl newid yr iaith.

data.name: TIME_DECREASE
data.value: Gostyngiad 1m Ctrl — Gostyngiad 15s Shift - Gostyngiad o 5m
data.comment: Tooltip displayed on "Minus" button to reduce time

data.name: TIME_INCREASE
data.comment: Tooltip displayed on "Plus" button to increase time

data.name: MANUAL_MODE
data.comment: Title displayed at the top of the main page when in manual mode

data.name: COUNTING_DOWN
data.comment: Tooltip on the Operator page "up/down" glyph

data.name: COUNTING_UP
data.comment: Tooltip on the Operator page "up/down" glyph

data.name: X_SECONDS
data.comment: See Settings => Timer window => Persist talk duration

data.name: SHOW_SECONDS
data.comment: See Settings, Main. Determines if settings are shown when displaying the digital clock (time of day)

data.name: OK
data.comment: Caption of the button that closes the snackbar

data.name: PORT_OPENED
data.value: Agorwyd y porthladd a gwnaed archeb
data.comment: See Settings => Remote Access. This is the message displayed in the snackbar when the port is successfully opened.

data.name: PORT_OPEN_FAILED
data.value: Methu agor y porth (gweler y log)!
data.comment: See Settings => Remote Access. This is the message displayed in the snackbar when the port could not be opened.

data.name: GENERATING_REPORT
data.comment: Displayed in the notification bar when the timing report is created

data.name: SHOULD_GENERATE_REPORTS
data.comment: See Settings => Misc

data.name: CONCLUDING_SEGMENT
data.comment: Title of the song and prayer segment at the end of a meeting (as it appears in the timing report)

data.name: INTERIM_SEGMENT
data.comment: Title of the song segment in the middle of a meeting (as it appears in the timing report)

data.name: INTRO_SEGMENT
data.comment: Title of the song and prayer segment at the beginning of a meeting (as it appears in the timing report)
